purpose_text.para: Holds the physical address of the end of the LORegion described in the current LORegion descriptor selected by LORC_EL1.DS.

configuration_text.para: This register is RES0 if any of the following apply:

listitem.content: No LORegion descriptors are supported by the PE.
LORC_EL1.DS points to a LORegion that is not supported by the PE.

text_before_fields.para: Any of the fields in this register are permitted to be cached in a TLB.

field_description.para: Extension to EA[47:16]. For more information, see EA[47:16].
Extension to EA[47:16]. For more information, see EA[47:16].

Bits [47:16] of the end physical address of an LORegion described in the current LORegion descriptor selected by LORC_EL1.DS. Bits[15:0] of this address are 0xFFFF. For implementations with fewer than 48 bits, the upper bits of this field are RES0.
When is implemented and 52-bit addresses are in use, EA[51:48] form bits [51:48] of the end physical address of the LORegion. Otherwise, when 52-bit addresses are not in use, EA[51:48] is RES0.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
